name: BTM
description:
Time machine has broken.Our character should collect cool items for repair. But our character is bleeding. He must collect item or items and turn around to time machine until his death. Btw there are lots of zombies out there. Welcome to the party!!

Controls

"W+A+S+D" Player movement

"Mouse + Left-Click" Look + Shoot

Credits

Muhammet Yıldız
